hadith.chapter: The Book of Transactions - كتاب البيوع
hadith.arabic-text: قال ابن عمر وحدثنا زيد بن ثابت، أن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم رخص في بيع العرايا ‏.‏ زاد ابن نمير في روايته أن تباع ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Zaid b. Thabit (Allah be pleased with him) said that Allah's Messenger (may peace be upon him) gave a concession in case of the sale known as al-araya, there is an addition of the word an tuba'a in the hadith transmitted by Ibn Numair.
